name: Boatyard.io
body:
This project has been deprecated in favour of Tutum's new [Automated Build](https://support.tutum.co/support/solutions/articles/5000638474-automated-builds) functionality. At the heart of this new feature is our open source [tutum/builder](https://github.com/tutumcloud/builder) image which tests and builds your docker repositories inside a container that can be launched on any docker engine.

If you want to automate your image builds and push them to any registry for free, [sign up for Tutum now!](https://dashboard.tutum.co/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
